## Introduction

-Lung adenocarcinoma is the primary cause of cancer-related death worldwide

-Smoking accounts for 80-90 % of the lung cancer cases

::: footer
Tonya Walser, Xiaoyan Cui, Jane Yanagawa, Jay M. Lee, Eileen Heinrich, Gina Lee, Sherven Sharma, and Steven M. Dubinett. Smoking and Lung Cancer. Proceedings of the American Thoracic Society, 5(8):811â€“815, December 2008. ISSN 1546-3222. doi: 10.1513/pats.200809-100TH
:::

```{r}


# Load Data
count_data <- readRDS("../R/01_count_data.rds") 
clinical_data <- readRDS("../R/01_clinical_data.rds") 
gene_ensembl <- readRDS("../R/01_gene_ensembl.rds")

# Subset the data to not load it all into the presentation
count_data_subset <- count_data[1:15, 1:10]
clinical_data_subset <- clinical_data[1:15,]
gene_ensembl_subset <- gene_ensembl[1:15,1:2]

```

## Materials and Methods

```{r, results='asis'}
# Clinical Data Table
cat("
<div style='width: 100%; 
            text-align: center; 
            margin-bottom: 0.5em; 
            font-size: 12px;'>
  <h3 style='margin: 0.3em 0;
            '>Clinical Data</h3>
  <div style='width: 100%; 
              height: 250px; 
              overflow-y: auto;'>
")
kable(clinical_data_subset, 
      format = "html", 
      table.attr = "style='width: 100%; 
                    border-collapse: collapse; 
                    font-size: 12px;'") |>
  kable_styling("striped", 
                full_width = TRUE, 
                font_size = 15) |>
  cat()
cat("</div></div>")

# Count Data Table
cat("
<div style='width: 65%; 
            text-align: center; 
            float: left; 
            margin-right: 0.5%; 
            font-size: 12px;'>
  <h3 style='margin: 0.3em 0;
            '>Count Data</h3>
  <div style='width: 100%; 
              height: 250px; 
              overflow-y: auto;'>
")
kable(count_data_subset, 
      format = "html", 
      table.attr = "style='width: 100%; 
                    border-collapse: collapse; 
                    font-size: 12px;'") |>
  kable_styling("striped", 
                full_width = TRUE, 
                font_size = 15) |>
  cat()
cat("</div></div>")

# Ensembl Data Table
cat("
<div style='width: 30%; 
            text-align: center; 
            float: right; 
            font-size: 12px;'>
  <h3 style='margin: 0.3em 0;
            '>Ensembl Data</h3>
  <div style='width: 100%; 
              height: 250px; 
              overflow-y: auto;'>
")
kable(gene_ensembl_subset, 
      format = "html", 
      table.attr = "style='width: 100%; 
                    border-collapse: collapse; 
                    font-size: 12px;'") |>
  kable_styling("striped", 
                full_width = TRUE, 
                font_size = 15) |>
  cat()
cat("</div></div>")
```
